topic.title: Cause Of Death Observation - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to CCD Family History Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.22)
SHALL conform to CDA Clinical Statement
SHALL conform to CCD Family History Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.22)
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode, where its data type is ActClassObservation
Contains exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, where its data type is x_ActMoodDocumentObservation
Contains exactly one [1..1] code, where its data type is CD
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code = "completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship, such that it
has @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ (has subject)
contains CCD Age Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.38) (CONF-224)
